mapper.select: select hd.aptCode aptCode, tmp.lat lat, tmp.lng lng, tmp.apartmentName apartmentName, tmp.address address from housedeal hd inner join (SELECT hi.aptCode, hi.apartmentName, lng, lat, concat(dc.sidoName, ' ', dc.gugunName, ' ', dc.dongName) address FROM houseinfo hi INNER JOIN dongcode dc ON hi.dongCode = dc.dongCode WHERE dc.sidoName like concat('%', #{sidoName}, '%') and dc.gugunName like concat('%', #{gugunName}, '%') and dc.dongName like concat('%', #{dongName}, '%') and (hi.apartmentName like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or dc.sidoName like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or dc.gugunName like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or dc.dongName like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') ) ) tmp on hd.aptCode = tmp.aptCode group by hd.aptCode
